column4: i can't see a video in a webpage, missing plugin to see windows media player videos, can someone help me ?
I like mplayer plugin-in (make sure you get w32codecs too), but there are others as well.  The package for the plugin is mozilla-mplayer
can you use a different pastebin?  pastebin.com won't load.  Try http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org or pastebin.ca
